steps.criteria: [NPC] Librarian: Greetings! Welcome to the Library!
[NPC] Blacksmith: I'm the town Blacksmith! I can reforge items for you, for a price.

steps.instruction:
Place Cow Minion
&cDon't forget a storage!

steps.criteria: [NPC] Bramass Beastslayer: Hello, adventurer! I am Bramass Beastslayer! I've slain beasts of all sorts across SkyBlock!
[NPC] Grandma Wolf: The pet does not need to be spawned for combos to work! Happy hunting!

steps.instruction: Apply Black Diamond to Zombie Pickaxe
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.instruction:
Give Rhys Enchanted Items
&c/warp mines if stuck

steps.has: You don't have enough Mithril Powder!

steps.instruction: Apply Black Diamond to Fractured Mithril Pickaxe
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.criteria: [NPC] Lone Adventurer: Try killing 5 of them!
[NPC] Archaeologist: Hey, are you an adventurer?
